basic.prefixMessage:
My prefix on this server is `{0}`
You can use the `{0}help` command to get a list of all my commands.
basic.cannotUsePrivateMessages: You cannot use this command in private messages!
basic.plaseGiveArg: Please give an argument to the post, <@{0}>!
basic.notPermission: **You can't do that, <@{0}>!** Not enough permission.
basic.errorOccurred: An error occurred while running this command.
basic.over2000: The message cannot be displayed because its size exceeds 2000 characters.

adblock.description: Turns the ad-blocking system on or off.

messages.ztnkapali: Currently the Ad Protection system is already turned off.
messages.gecersizislm: You have given an invalid argument.
messages.reklamyasak: Discord Server Invite protection is turned on on this server.

afk.description: Sets your status to AFK and notifies when someone tags you on the server.

messages.afkbilgi: {0}, The person named <@{1}> you tagged is now AFK because of **{2}**.
messages.success: {0}, You have successfully switched to 'AFK' mode due to **{1}**.

ascii.description: Throws something you say as ASCII ART.

messages.maxcharacter: You used too many characters! I can write a text with a maximum of 75 characters.
messages.plsargs: Please write an ASCII art text!

messages.plsquestion:
Please ask a question!
Example usage: {0}anket [question] {Option 1} {Option 2} {Option 3(Optional)} {Option 4(Optional)} {Option 5(Optional)}
messages.minquestioncharacter: Your question must be a minimum of 4 characters..
messages.plsoption:
Please specify at least 2 options.
Example Usage: {0}anket [question] {Option 1} {Option 2} {Option 3(Optional)} {Option 4(Optional)} {Option 5(Optional)}
messages.maxoption: A poll can have up to 5 choices!
messages.question: :bar_chart: | **Survey**

avatar.description: See your own or a member's avatar.

ban.description: Block a member from the server.

messages.cannotBanCrypon: Hey you! You cannot block me using this command.
messages.memberIsAdmin: Take it slow, an administrator cannot be banned off his/her own server!

botinfo.description: See the bot's usage and operating system information.

deposit.description: Transfers your money from your wallet to the bank.

messages.nottransferredmoney: ‚ùå You have no money to transfer!
messages.plstransferamount: ‚ùå Please specify how much to transfer!
messages.walletnotmoneyamount: ‚ùå Your wallet doesn't have as much money as you stated!
messages.banktransferamountmin: ‚ùå You can deposit at least 1 CP into your bank account!
messages.successfullytransferred: ‚úÖ You have successfully transferred {0} TL to your bank account!

fakemesaj.description: You pretend to send another message.

messages.membernotexited: You did not specify any members!
messages.memberisbot: Fake message cannot be used on bots!

gif.description: Shows a GIF from Tenor as per the given parameter.

grole.description: Give the member you designate the role you want.

messages.maxArgs: This command takes up to 2 arguments!
messages.rolePosition: My role must be higher in order to perform this operation. Please take my role up.
messages.roleAdded: The {0} role **has been added** to the <@{1}> member.
messages.errorOccurred: There was a **problem** adding the {0} role to the <@{1}> member.

hack.description: They're aimed at the person you're hacking. (Fun is a command.)

messages.hackcomplete:
<@{0}> The person was hacked. 

Here is the Login Information
Email: {1} 
Password: {2}
messages.plsmember: Please mention a person to be hacked!

help.description: It makes a list of all the commands you can use in the bot.

messages.listOfAllOfTheCommands: Here is a list of all the commands you can use on me.
messages.moreDetailsWithGuild:
You can use the `{0}help <command>` command on the **{1}** server to get more detailed information.

Support Server: https://discord.gg/AHfPcmjVpH
messages.moreDetails:
You can use the command `{0}help <command>` to get more detailed information.

Support Server: https://discord.gg/AHfPcmjVpH
messages.iSentCommands: I have sent you the list of all my commands as a private message.
messages.errorOccurred: I am getting an error sending commands to you. You may have blocked private messages.

invite.description: It sends the bot's invitation link, website and support server in a single message.

messages.inviteEmbed:
:love_letter: **Invitation Link**
[Click it, let it come!](https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=815184711416152094&scope=bot&permissions=8)

:floppy_disk: **Support Server**
[Join Us](https://discord.gg/AHfPcmjVpH)

:gem: **Website**
[Visit](https://aliyasiny65.github.io/crypon/index.html)

invites.description: See how many people a member has invited

messages.memberNotExists: Hey <@{0}>, there is no such member!

job.description: The bot chooses a random job for you or the member you tag.

messages.embedDescription: The profession I chose for you: **{0}**

messages.cannotKickCrypon: Hey you! You **cannot** kick me with this command!
messages.cannotKickYourself: You cannot kick yourself off a server!

languages.description: See all languages available on the bot.

lock.description: It turns off the authorization to write to everyone on the channel you are using the command. (Users with administrative authority can still write.)

logchannel.description: Choose the channel you want to keep track of what is happening on the server.

messages.selectChannel: Please select the channel I will keep logging!
messages.successful: The logging channel has been successfully set to {0}.
messages.errorOccurred: I am getting an error while setting up the logging channel.

love.description: It shows the love you have with the member you tagged.

messages.memberRequired: Please tag a member or enter an ID!
messages.notYourself: You cannot measure your love for yourself!
messages.sixth: **I wish you happiness in your life.**

minfo.description: See your own or another member's information.

mute.description: Mute the member you tagged for the time you specified.

messages.enter32bit: The time you specified is too much!
messages.writeValidTime: Please set a valid time! The specified time must be at least 5 seconds.
messages.memberMutedDescription: <@{0}> was muted for a certain period of time.
messages.selectRole: Please choose the role that will be given to members to be muted!

ping.description: Learn out the ping value of the bot.

purge.description: Delete the number of messages you specified.

messages.argMustBeNumber: The entered value must be a number! **{0}** is not a number.
messages.argLimit: The number of messages to be deleted must be between 1 and 100!

roles.description: It shows all roles on the server and the number of roles on the server.

messages.rolesembed:
This server has {0} roles. List of Roles;

reload.description: Reload the command of your choice.

messages.commandNotFound: Such a command is not defined!
messages.successful: The `{0}` command has been successfully reloaded!
messages.errorOccurred: An error occurs while reloading the command `{0}`.

report.description: Report an issue to the maker of the bot.

messages.minArgLength: A issue report should consist of at least 3 words.!
messages.successful: Your report has been successfully delivered to the producers, <@!{0}>! It will be evaluated in the fastest way and what is needed will be done.

rmrole.description: Remove the role you want from the member you specified.

messages.maxArgs: This command takes up to 2 arguments!
messages.memberAdmin: You cannot remove any role from the server administrator!
messages.cannotRemoveFromYourself: You can't take a role from yourself!
messages.roleRemoved: The {0} role **has been removed** from the <@{1}> member.

messages.successful: Auto role has been successfully set to {0}.

messages.argAlert: This command takes at most 1 argument!

slowmode.description: Sets the message sending time limit, that is, the slow mode time, as the time you specify on the channel you use the command.

messages.successful: Slow mode time successfully set to {0} seconds!
messages.wrongargs: You gave wrong argument! Slow mode duration can be minimum 1 second.

messages.memberNotBanned: This member is not already unbanned.
messages.successful: The ban on <@{0}> has been successfully lifted!
messages.errorOccurred: There was a problem unbaning the user.

unlock.description: If the channel you are on has a lock, it removes it.

unlogchannel.description: Delete the previously selected logging channel.

messages.channelNotSelected: The logging channel is not already selected.

unmute.description: Turn off mute of a muted member.

messages.memberNotMuted: This member is not already muted or the mute role has not been selected.

unsetautorole.description: Remove previously selected auto role activity.

unwlcchannel.description: Delete the previously selected welcome channel.

events.guildOwnerMessage:
Have you had a problem with me?
If so, you can notify the producers with the newly added `report` command. For example: `!creport This is a report.`
